description: Pomade acne is a type of acne that occurs due to the use of hair pomades or styling products that clog pores on the scalp and forehead.
possible causes: Use of heavy hair styling products
Clogging of pores by hair products
symptoms: Small red bumps on the forehead and scalp
Pimples or blackheads in the affected area
treatments: Regularly washing the affected area with a gentle cleanser
